overview: Miguel Matos started his web based work back in 2002 when helping a Portuguese Environment NGO (Carnivora) to launch its web page. Since then he has written sporadically about technology for some Portuguese sites. Only in the end of 2008 he started to write regularly about technology with the foundation of the guia das tecnologias blog (technology guide blog).

degrees.subject: Biology
degrees.institution: Faculty of Sciences from the University of Lisbon (FCUL)
